title: Wikileaks E-mail says that Obama directed his supporters to participate in "the fraud of voters from all the Americas."
subtitle: One of the WikiLeaks e-mails referred to unproven rumours that Obama's campaign had "raised" democratic gatherings in Iowa 2008 with voters outside the state.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: "WikiLeaks" "Archive Bodista" included an e-mail that stated that President Obama "guided his supporters in Colorado to engage in a small fraud of American voters."
